document_data.caption: An alembic.
document_data.name: Alembic
document_data.text: I suppose one alembic's pretty much like another when you know what to do with it.
document_data.source: [[Jasper (servant)|Jasper]], watching those who actually know what to do with it
document_data.mainbody: [[Benelaius]] and [[Lindavar]] both used an alembic, together with reagents and a [[centrifuge]], to examine the blood of Mayor [[Tobald]] of [[Ghars]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}, discovering the [[poison]] [[blackweed]].
document_data.Description: These devices included a pear-shaped glass vessel called a cucurbit, a venting cap, and a rounded receiver where distilled liquid would collect. These were mounted on a metal stand. Typically, three alembics were required for a complete laboratory setup.
document_data.Availability: They were sold through [[Aurora's Emporium]] and the [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]].
document_data.Notable Alembics:
;Shaper's Alembic
:A [[magic item|magical]] alembic that could convert, divide, and combine the essence of the four primary elements—[[air]], [[Earth (element)|earth]], [[fire]], and [[water]]. These essences could then be used to apply [[enchantment]]s to items. In [[1374 DR]], these were sold in the city of [[Mulsantir]] by the merchant [[Azim Qo'toth]].
